ygData.subject: RE: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: Keep reading the news, though.  Instead of being dropped by a mob it is going to be through a class specific quest (details not known yet). Hopefully they will
ygData.messageBody:
Keep reading the news, though. Instead of being dropped by a mob it is
going to be through a class specific quest (details not known yet).
Hopefully they will make it so that only that class can do it and change the
warrior crafted quest where only warriors can do it.

> ----------
> From: kale eusi[SMTP:kaleusi@...]
> Reply To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, October 11, 1999 6:42 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
>
> From: "kale eusi" <kaleusi@...>
>

> having
